TriggerOraclev10g.name: SNAP$COMM_MASTER_DETAIL
TriggerOraclev10g.body:
declare dmltype char;
begin
IF DBMS_REPUTIL.FROM_REMOTE = FALSE THEN
if inserting then dmltype := 'I';
INSERT INTO "OSD"."SNAP$COMM_MASTER_DETAIL"
(PROCESS_NO,YEAR,DEPARTMENT_NO,RECIEVED_TO_CODE,
IN_OUT_NUM,IN_DEPT_CLASS,IN_ARCHIVE_NO,IN_DATE_DD,
IN_DATE_MM,IN_DATE_YY,IN_OUT_TYPE,ACTION_CODE,EMPLOYEE_NO,
SERIAL_NO,USER_ID,INTERY_TIME,IN_ACCOMPANIED,CREATE_DATE) VALUES
(:NEW.PROCESS_NO, :NEW.YEAR, :NEW.DEPARTMENT_NO,:NEW.RECIEVED_TO_CODE,
:NEW.IN_OUT_NUM, :NEW.IN_DEPT_CLASS,:NEW.IN_ARCHIVE_NO,:NEW.IN_DATE_DD,
:NEW.IN_DATE_MM, :NEW.IN_DATE_YY, :NEW.IN_OUT_TYPE, :NEW.ACTION_CODE,
:NEW.EMPLOYEE_NO,:NEW.SERIAL_NO, :NEW.USER_ID, :NEW.INTERY_TIME,
:NEW.IN_ACCOMPANIED ,:NEW.CREATE_DATE);
elsif updating then dmltype := 'U';
update "OSD"."SNAP$COMM_MASTER_DETAIL"
set PROCESS_NO = :NEW.PROCESS_NO ,YEAR =:NEW.YEAR ,DEPARTMENT_NO= :NEW.DEPARTMENT_NO,
RECIEVED_TO_CODE= :NEW.RECIEVED_TO_CODE , IN_OUT_NUM = :NEW.IN_OUT_NUM ,IN_DEPT_CLASS = :NEW.IN_DEPT_CLASS ,
IN_ARCHIVE_NO = :NEW.IN_ARCHIVE_NO ,IN_DATE_DD =:NEW.IN_DATE_DD , IN_DATE_MM = :NEW.IN_DATE_MM
,IN_DATE_YY = :NEW.IN_DATE_YY ,IN_OUT_TYPE = :NEW.IN_OUT_TYPE ,ACTION_CODE = :NEW.ACTION_CODE ,
EMPLOYEE_NO = :NEW.EMPLOYEE_NO , SERIAL_NO = :NEW.SERIAL_NO ,USER_ID = :NEW.USER_ID ,
INTERY_TIME = :NEW.INTERY_TIME ,IN_ACCOMPANIED = :NEW.IN_ACCOMPANIED ,CREATE_DATE = :NEW.CREATE_DATE
WHERE PROCESS_NO=:OLD.PROCESS_NO
AND YEAR =:OLD.YEAR
AND SERIAL_NO =:OLD.SERIAL_NO;

elsif deleting then dmltype := 'D';
DELETE "OSD"."SNAP$COMM_MASTER_DETAIL"
WHERE PROCESS_NO=:OLD.PROCESS_NO
AND YEAR =:OLD.YEAR
AND SERIAL_NO =:OLD.SERIAL_NO;
end if;
END IF;
end;
